publicwhip.major-heading: Joint Oireachtas Committee on Jobs, Enterprise and Innovation

speech.p: Deputy Dara Calleary, Senator David Cullinane, Deputy Robert Dowds,* Senator Michael Mullins, Deputy Noel Harrington,* Senator Hildegarde Naughton, Deputy Seán Kyne, Senator Feargal Quinn. Deputy Anthony Lawlor, Deputy Peadar Tóibín,
* In the absence of Deputy Áine Collins and John Lyons, respectively.
Deputy Marcella Corcoran Kennedy IN THE CHAIR.
The joint committee met in private session until 1.57 p.m.

publicwhip.minor-heading: Transatlantic Trade and Investment Partnership: Motion

speech.p: A vote has been called on the following motion in the name of Deputy Tóibín:
Under Standing Orders we are obliged to wait eight minutes or until full membership is present before proceeding to take the division.
Question put: "That the motion be agreed to."

Tá Níl Calleary, Dara.
Cullinane, David.
Quinn, Feargal.
Tóibín, Peadar. Corcoran Kennedy, Marcella.
Dowds, Robert.
Harrington, Noel.
Kyne, Seán.
Lawlor, Anthony.
Mullins, Michael.
Naughton, Hildegarde. <
The joint committee went into private session at 2.08 p.m. and adjourned at 2.23 p.m. until 1.30 p.m. on Tuesday, 24 November 2015.
